message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is fair for both of us in the long run.
I understand you want a larger share, but my offer is the most reasonable starting point. This ensures we both benefit significantly from an early agreement.
Bob, time is running out. My offer is still the most sensible. Let's settle this now before inflation eats away at our gains.
Alice, it's clear we both want a good deal.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Let's end this here before inflation hurts us both even more.
